## Research Tools

### Conference Search
- [ETH Conference Search Tool](https://stag-library.ethz.ch/client/en_GB/default/search/simple?&qf=ETHCSEARCH_LOCATION&qu=ETHCSEARCH) - A comprehensive database for searching academic conferences and events

### Academic Resources
- [Google Scholar](https://scholar.google.com/citations?user=_WTuVPIAAAAJ) - Search across scholarly literature
- [arXiv](https://arxiv.org/) - Open access archive for scholarly articles
- [DBLP](https://dblp.org/pid/231/1775.html) - Computer Science Bibliography
- [ECCC](https://eccc.weizmann.ac.il/) - Electronic Colloquium on Computational Complexity

### Research and Note-taking Tools
- [Zotero](https://www.zotero.org/) - Reference management software
- [Obsidian](https://obsidian.md/) - Knowledge base and note-taking
- [Notion](https://www.notion.so/) - All-in-one workspace for notes and collaboration
